subject: Re: AJAX, Graphs and Perl backend
body:
cldmismgr wrote:
> On Jul 1, 1:05 am, theill...@yahoo.com (Mathew Snyder) wrote:
>> Does anyone know what the best route to creating graphs using AJAX and Perl
>> would be?  I've been running various searches on this and haven't found any
>> solid information on how to make this happen.
>>
>> Thanks
>> Mathew
>> --
>> Keep up with me and what I'm up to:http://theillien.blogspot.com
> 
> search.cpan.org
> enter graph in the search field
> 
> 

I'm aware of that but, it doesn't address my request.  I'm not
interested in just graphing modules.  I'm interested in knowing about
using Perl's graphing capabilities as a backend for AJAX.

Mathew
Keep up with my goings on at http://theillien.blogspot.com
